name: DKTabPageViewController
summary: DKTabPageViewController is an UIViewController subclass that support for multiple tab and gestures.
description: DKTabPageViewController is an UIViewController subclass that support for multiple tab and gestures. Each tab represents a ViewController instance, independent of each other. View supports lazy loading and response viewWillAppear„ÄÅviewWillDisappear etc methods. Adding support for custom animation to text of the top bar.
